verses.verse: Now <WG1161> in <WG1722> the fifteenth <WG4003> year <WG2094> of the reign <WG2231> of Tiberius <WG5086> Caesar <WG2541>, Pontius <WG4194> Pilate <WG4091> being governor <WG2230> of Judaea <WG2449>, and <WG2532> Herod <WG2264> being tetrarch <WG5075> of Galilee <WG1056>, and <WG1161> his <WG846> brother <WG80> Philip <WG5376> tetrarch <WG5075> of the region <WG5561> of Ituraea <WG2484> and <WG2532> Trachonitis <WG5139>, and <WG2532> Lysanias <WG3078> tetrarch <WG5075> of Abilene <WG9>,

in <WG1909> the high-priesthood <WG749> of Annas <WG452> and <WG2532> Caiaphas <WG2533>, the word <WG4487> of God <WG2316> came <WG1096> unto <WG1909> John <WG2491> the son <WG5207> of Zacharias <WG2197> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2048>.

And <WG2532> he came <WG2064> into <WG1519> all <WG3956> the region round about <WG4066> the Jordan <WG2446>, preaching <WG2784> the baptism <WG908> of repentance <WG3341> unto <WG1519> remission <WG859> of sins <WG266>;

as <WG5613> it is written <WG1125> in <WG1722> the book <WG976> of the words <WG3056> of Isaiah <WG2268> the prophet <WG4396>, The <WG3004> voice <WG5456> of one crying <WG994> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2048>, Make ye <WG2090> ready the way <WG3598> of the Lord <WG2962>, Make <WG4160> his <WG846> paths <WG5147> straight <WG2117>.

Every <WG3956> valley <WG5327> shall be filled <WG4137>, And <WG2532> every <WG3956> mountain <WG3735> and <WG2532> hill <WG1015> shall be brought low <WG5013>; And <WG2532> the crooked <WG4646> shall become <WG2071> straight <WG2117>, And <WG2532> the rough <WG5138> ways3598, 1519 smooth <WG3006>;
And <WG2532> all <WG3956> flesh <WG4561> shall see <WG3700> the salvation <WG4992> of God <WG2316>.

He <WG3004> said therefore <WG3767> to the multitudes <WG3793> that went out <WG1607> to be baptized <WG907> of <WG5259> him <WG846>, Ye offspring <WG1081> of vipers <WG2191>, who <WG5101> warned <WG5263> you <WG5213> to flee <WG5343> from <WG575> the wrath <WG3709> to come <WG3195>?

Bring forth <WG4160> therefore <WG3767> fruits <WG2590> worthy <WG514> of repentance <WG3341>, and <WG2532> begin <WG756> not <WG3361> to say <WG3004> within <WG1722> yourselves <WG1438>, We have <WG2192> Abraham <WG11> to <WG3962> our father <WG3962>: for <WG1063> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, that <WG3754> God <WG2316> is able <WG1410> of <WG1537> these <WG5130> stones <WG3037> to raise up <WG1453> children <WG5043> unto Abraham <WG11>.

And <WG1161> even now <WG2235> the axe <WG513> also <WG2532> lieth <WG2749> at <WG4314> the root <WG4491> of the trees <WG1186>: every <WG3956> tree <WG1186> therefore <WG3767> that bringeth <WG4160> not <WG3361> forth <WG4160> good <WG2570> fruit <WG2590> is hewn down <WG1581>, and <WG2532> cast <WG906> into <WG1519> the fire <WG4442>.
And <WG2532> the multitudes <WG3793> asked <WG1905> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, What <WG5101> then <WG3767> must we do <WG4160>?

And he answered <WG611> and <WG1161> said <WG3004> unto them <WG846>, He that hath <WG2192> two <WG1417> coats <WG5509>, let him impart <WG3330> to him that hath <WG2192> none <WG3361>; and <WG2532> he that hath <WG2192> food <WG1033>, let him do <WG4160> likewise <WG3668>.

And there <WG1161> came <WG2064> also <WG2532> publicans <WG5057> to be baptized <WG907>, and <WG2532> they said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, Teacher <WG1320>, what <WG5101> must we do <WG4160>?
And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>, Extort <WG4238> no <WG3367> more <WG4119> than <WG3844> that which is appointed <WG1299> you <WG5213>.

And <WG1161> soldiers <WG4754> also <WG2532> asked <WG1905> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, And <WG2532> we <WG2249>, what <WG5101> must <WG4160> we <WG2249> do <WG4160>? And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>, Extort from <WG1286> no man <WG3367> by violence <WG3366>, neither accuse <WG4811> any one wrongfully <WG4811>; and <WG2532> be content <WG714> with <WG3800> your <WG5216> wages <WG3800>.

And <WG1161> as the people <WG2992> were in <WG1722> expectation <WG4328>, and <WG2532> all men <WG3956> reasoned <WG1260> in <WG1722> their <WG846> hearts <WG2588> concerning <WG4012> John <WG2491>, whether <WG3379> haply he <WG846> were <WG1498> the Christ <WG5547>;

John <WG2491> answered <WG611>, saying <WG3004> unto <WG537> them all <WG537>, I <WG1473> indeed <WG3303> baptize <WG907> you <WG5209> with water <WG5204>; but <WG1161> there cometh <WG2064> he that is <WG3450> mightier than <WG2478> I <WG846>, the latchet <WG2438> of whose <WG3739> shoes <WG5266> I <WG846> am <WG1510> not <WG3756> worthy <WG2425> to unloose <WG3089>: he <WG846> shall baptize <WG907> you <WG5209> in the <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> and <WG2532> in fire <WG4442>:

whose <WG3739> fan <WG4425> is in <WG1722> his <WG846> hand <WG5495>, thoroughly to cleanse <WG1245> his <WG846> threshing-floor <WG257>, and <WG2532> to gather <WG4863> the wheat <WG4621> into <WG1519> his <WG846> garner <WG596>; but <WG1161> the chaff <WG892> he will burn <WG2618> up with unquenchable <WG762> fire <WG4442>.
With <WG2532> many <WG4183> other exhortations <WG3870> therefore preached he <WG2097> good tidings <WG2087> unto the people <WG2992>;

but <WG1161> Herod <WG2264> the tetrarch <WG5076>, being reproved <WG1651> by <WG5259> him <WG846> for <WG4012> Herodias <WG2266> his <WG846> brother <WG80>'s <WG5376> wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> for <WG4012> all <WG3956> the evil <WG4190> things which <WG3739> Herod <WG2264> had done <WG4160>,
added <WG4369> this <WG5124> also <WG2532> to <WG1909> them all <WG3956>, that <WG2532> he shut up <WG2623> John <WG2491> in <WG1722> prison <WG5438>.

Now <WG1161> it came to pass <WG1096>, when <WG1722> all <WG537> the people <WG2992> were baptized <WG907>, that <WG2424>, Jesus also <WG2532> having been baptized <WG907>, and <WG2532> praying <WG4336>, the heaven <WG3772> was opened <WG455>,

and <WG2532> the <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> descended <WG2597> in a bodily <WG4984> form <WG1491>, as <WG5616> a dove <WG4058>, upon <WG1909> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> a voice <WG5456> came <WG1096> out <WG1537> of heaven <WG3772>, <WG3004> Thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27> Son <WG5207>; in <WG1722> thee <WG4671> I am well pleased <WG2106>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> himself <WG846>, when he began <WG756> to teach <WG5616>, was about thirty <WG5144> years <WG2094> of age <WG2094>, being <WG5607> the son <WG5207> (as <WG5613> was <WG2242> supposed <WG3543>) of Joseph <WG2501>, the son of Heli <WG2242>,
the son of Matthat <WG3158>, the son of Levi <WG3017>, the son of Melchi <WG3197>, the son of Jannai <WG2388>, the son of Joseph <WG2501>,
the son of Mattathias <WG3161>, the son of Amos <WG301>, the son of Nahum <WG3486>, the son of Esli <WG2069>, the son of Naggai <WG3477>,
the son of Maath <WG3092>, the son of Mattathias <WG3161>, the son of Semein <WG4584>, the son of Josech <WG2501>, the son of Joda <WG2455>,
the son of Joanan <WG2490>, the son of Rhesa <WG4488>, the son of Zerubbabel <WG2216>, the son of Shealtiel <WG4528>, the son of Neri <WG3518>,
the son of Melchi <WG3197>, the son of Addi <WG78>, the son of Cosam <WG2973>, the son of Elmadam <WG1678>, the son of Er <WG2262>,
the son of Jesus <WG2499>, the son of Eliezer <WG1663>, the son of Jorim <WG2497>, the son of Matthat <WG3158>, the son of Levi <WG3017>,
the son of Symeon <WG4826>, the son of Judas <WG2455>, the son of Joseph <WG2501>, the son of Jonam <WG2494>, the son of Eliakim <WG1662>,
the son of Melea <WG3190>, the son of Menna <WG3104>, the son of Mattatha <WG3160>, the son of Nathan <WG3481>, the son of David <WG1138>,
the son of Jesse <WG2421>, the son of Obed <WG5601>, the son of Boaz <WG1003>, the son of Salmon <WG4533>, the son of Nahshon <WG3476>,
the son of Amminadab <WG284>, the son of Arni <WG689>, the son of Hezron <WG2074>, the son of Perez <WG5329>, the son of Judah <WG2455>,
the son of Jacob <WG2384>, the son of Isaac <WG2464>, the son of Abraham <WG11>, the son of Terah <WG2291>, the son of Nahor <WG3493>,
the son of Serug <WG4562>, the son of Reu <WG4466>, the son of Peleg <WG5317>, the son of Eber <WG1443>, the son of Shelah <WG4527>,
the son of Cainan <WG2536>, the son of Arphaxad <WG742>, the son of Shem <WG4590>, the son of Noah <WG3575>, the son of Lamech <WG2984>,
the son of Methuselah <WG3103>, the son of Enoch <WG1802>, the son of Jared <WG2391>, the son of Mahalaleel <WG3121>, the son of Cainan <WG2536>,
the son of Enos <WG1800>, the son of Seth <WG4589>, the son of Adam <WG76>, the son of God <WG2316>.
